data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Oyakawa, Osvaldo T., Fichberg, Ilana, Py-Daniel, Lucia Rapp (2018): Three new species of Harttia (Loricariidae: Loricariinae) from Serra do Cachimbo, Rio Xingu basin, Pará, Northern Brazil. Zootaxa 4387 (1): 75-90, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4387.1.3|25 occurrences
